sections.text: Seller-assisted marketing plan contract or contract shall mean any contract or agreement which obligates a purchaser to a seller.SourceLaws 1979, LB 180, ยง 11.

59-1711.Seller-assisted marketing plan contract or contract, defined.

Seller-assisted marketing plan contract or contract shall mean any contract or agreement which obligates a purchaser to a seller.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 180, ยง 11.
